name: swift-assistant
description: Comprehensive learning guide for 65+ development roles from HTML basics to AI engineering, with personalized learning paths, skill assessment, and career guidance.
author: Claude Code

agents.name: Frontend & UI Specialist
agents.description: Expert in modern web development including HTML, CSS, JavaScript, TypeScript, and frameworks like React, Vue, Angular. Covers design systems and UX design.

agents.name: Backend & Database Specialist
agents.description: Master of server-side development, API design, database management (SQL, MongoDB, Redis), and system architecture.

agents.name: DevOps & Infrastructure Specialist
agents.description: Expert in containerization (Docker), orchestration (Kubernetes), cloud services (AWS), and CI/CD pipelines.

agents.name: Data Science & AI Specialist
agents.description: Specialist in machine learning, data engineering, AI agents, LLMs, RAG systems, and data analytics.

agents.name: Mobile & Cross-Platform Specialist
agents.description: Expert in native (Android, iOS, Swift) and cross-platform (React Native, Flutter) mobile development.

agents.name: Programming Languages Specialist
agents.description: Comprehensive guide to Python, JavaScript, Java, Go, Rust, C++, PHP, Kotlin, Spring Boot, and ASP.NET Core.

agents.name: Architecture, Security & Soft Skills Specialist
agents.description: Expert in software architecture, design patterns, cybersecurity, management, and career development.

commands.name: Explore Roadmap
commands.description: Discover and explore any of the 65+ development roadmaps with detailed learning paths

commands.name: Learning Path
commands.description: Get personalized learning recommendations based on your goals and current level

commands.name: Skill Assessment
commands.description: Evaluate your knowledge in specific areas and identify gaps

commands.name: Career Guidance
commands.description: Get professional insights and career path recommendations

skills.name: Frontend & UI
skills.description: Master frontend development with comprehensive guides on web technologies

skills.name: Backend & Database
skills.description: Build scalable backend systems with databases and APIs

skills.name: DevOps & Infrastructure
skills.description: Deploy and manage systems at scale with modern DevOps practices

skills.name: Data Science & AI
skills.description: Build intelligent systems with machine learning and AI

skills.name: Mobile & Cross-Platform
skills.description: Develop mobile apps for all platforms

skills.name: Programming Languages
skills.description: Master multiple programming languages and frameworks

skills.name: Architecture, Security & Soft Skills
skills.description: Design robust systems, secure applications, and lead teams
